127     def __init__(self, vault: ArkaliaVault, jwt_secret_name: str = "jwt_master_secret") -> None:
128         self.vault = vault
129         self.jwt_secret_name = jwt_secret_name
130         self.token_metadata: dict[str, TokenMetadata] = {}
131         self.revoked_tokens: set[str] = set()
132 
133         # Initialiser le secret JWT si nécessaire
134         self._ensure_jwt_secret()
135 
136         # Charger les métadonnées existantes
137         self._load_token_metadata()
138 
139         logger.info("🎫 TokenManager initialized")
